message_id._comment: Unique identifier for the error message

error_message_hash._comment: The hash of the error message for deduplication

traceback._comment: The stack trace of the error

traceback_hash._comment: The hash of the traceback for deduplication

error_type._comment: The type of the error (e.g., ValueError, ConnectionError)

error_type_hash._comment: The hash of the error type

site._comment: The site of the error message. It must be one of the following: 'dev', 'stage', 'prod'

service._comment: The composed service name from log_group and module_name (log_group.module_name)

index_name._comment: The index name of the error message

topic._comment: The topic of the error message. Not used for now.

count._comment: The count of the error message within 5 minutes

request_id._comment: The request ID associated with the error

category._comment: The category of the error (e.g., ERROR, WARNING, FATAL)

module_name._comment: The module name where the error occurred
